analyzed: vuttam ha etam bhagavatā vuttam arahatā iti me suta
translated: This was said by the Blessed One, said by the Arahant, so I have heard:

analyzed: rūpa dhātu arūpa dhātu nirodha dhātu
translated: The element of form, the formless element, and the element of cessation.

analyzed: imāḥ kho bhikkhave tissaḥ dhātuyaḥ ti

translated: And in this connection it was said:
“Having fully understood the element of form,
those who are liberated in cessation
are people who have escaped the hook.
Having touched with their body🔽the deathless element free of acquisitions,

analyzed: phusayitvā nirūpadhi  upadhi paṭinissagga  sacchikatvā anāsavaḥ  deseti sammāsambuddhaḥ
translated: having directly known the relinquishing of all acquisitions,🔽the stainless ones🔽teach the sorrowless, dust-free state

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
analyzed: ayam pi atthaḥ vuttaḥ bhagavatā iti me sutam ti
translated: This is the meaning of what the Blessed One said. So it was heard by me.
